subtitle: uchebno-prakticheskoe posobie : prigranichnai͡a torgovli͡a, svobodnye ėkonomicheskie zony, offshornye kompanii
title: Osobye rezhimy vneshneėkonomicheskoĭ dei͡atelʹnosti: pravo i praktika
subjects: Free ports and zones -- Law and legislation -- Russia (Federation)
by_statement: V.V. Kushchenko ; pod redakt͡sieĭ N.K. Naroznikova.

description.value: This educational manual is devoted to the issues of foreign economic activity on territories with special legal regimes. Analysis of the modern theory with the use of some historical aspects provides a general perspective for the evaluation of conditions of border trade, development of zones of free trade and utilization of offshore zones.
